comment.author: 42264328@N00
comment._content: Another one with a date, 21 March 1913 (3/21/13).

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Cotinis: Thanks for the date information.  We think that since these relate to Wilson's inauguration on March 4, 1913, that this date may be incorrect and may have actually been March 2, 1913.
